live_updates: Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
38645.summary: Some customers in the Red Carpet area in Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and  apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
38645.title: June 18 - Calgary (Red Carpet) l All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
